name: Project GOS
description:
Play the pre-alpha build for Project GOS, a new turn based, rock-paper-scissors style game created entirely by... Me!

-Learn about the Planet [Redacted] and its history through lore, while interacting with the strange creatures that inhabit it.

-Cast spells to dominate enemies, collect their drops, and create new spells for endless Spellset building.

-Solve puzzles and advance through the story with engaging, fun but simple gameplay.

-Unlock new characters, each equipped with their own Passive Effect.  Each character is unique, forcing different build paths and play patterns.

-Cook foods to help you survive while out questing; or perhaps to sell for money!

-Coming Soon-

Relic Items. To encourage further deckbuilding, Relic Items offer an additional passive effect. Synergize relics with spells and certain characters for crazy damage!

-Shop Systems. Buyable Items!

-More Characters and spells

- More Maps

-PVP(Online)
